resources.string: Please configure your serial port first.
You do not have read/write permission to the serial port.
The serial port can not be opened for an unknown reason.

<head>
            <meta charset="utf-8">
            <title>A simple, clean, and responsive HTML invoice template</title>

            <style>
            .invoice-box {
                max-width: 500px;
                margin: auto;
                padding: 30px;
                border: 1px solid #eee;
                box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, .15);
                font-size: 16px;
                line-height: 24px;
                font-family: \'Helvetica Neue\', \'Helvetica\', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
                color: #555;
            }

            .invoice-box table {
                width: 100%;
                line-height: inherit;
                text-align: left;
            }

            .invoice-box table td {
                padding: 5px;
                vertical-align: top;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr td:nth-child(2) {
                text-align: left;
            }

             .invoice-box table tr.heading td:nth-child(3) {
                text-align: center;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.top table td {
                padding-bottom: 20px;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.top td.title {
                font-size: 45px;
                line-height: 45px;
                text-align: center;
                color: #333;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.information table td {
                padding-bottom: 10px;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.heading tr {
                weight: 100px;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr td:nth-child(1) {
                text-align: left;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr td:nth-child(2) {
                text-align: right;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.heading td {
                background: #eee;
                border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
                font-weight: bold;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.details td {
                padding-bottom: 20px;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.heading td:nth-child(2){
                        text-align: center;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.heading td:nth-child(3){
                        text-align: center;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.heading td:nth-child(4){
                        text-align: center;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.item td:nth-child(3){
                        text-align: center;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.item td:nth-child(4){
                        text-align: right;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.total_detail.table td:nth-child(3){
                        text-align: left;
            }
            .invoice-box table tr.total_detail td.total_detail_bill{
                        text-align: right;
                      font-weight: bold;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.total_detail td.total_detail_bill_title{
                    font-weight: bold;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.total_detail:nth-child(2) {
                border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.item td{
                border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.heading td {
                background: #eee;
                border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
                font-weight: bold;
            }
            .invoice-box table tr.total td:nth-child(1){
                border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
            }
            .invoice-box table tr.total td:nth-child(2){
                border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
            }
            .invoice-box table tr.total_detail td:nth-child(4){
                        text-align: right;
            }
            .invoice-box tr.border_bottom_line td:nth-child(1){
                text-align: left;
                    border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
                font-weight: bold;
            }
            .invoice-box table tr.total_detail table tr.border_bottom td:nth-child(1){
                        text-align: left;
                            border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
                        font-weight: bold;
            }
           .invoice-box table tr.total_detail table tr.border_bottom td:nth-child(2){
                        text-align: left;
                            border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
                        font-weight: bold;
            }

           .invoice-box table tr.total_detail table tr.border_bottom td:nth-child(3){
                       text-align: right;
                            border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
                      font-weight: bold;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.total_detail td:nth-child(2){
                        text-align: right;
            }

            .invoice-box table tr.title td{
                    text-align: center;
            }
            @media only screen and (max-width: 500px) {
                .invoice-box table tr.top table td {
                    width: 100%;
                    display: block;
                    text-align: center;
                }

                .invoice-box table tr.information table td {
                    width: 100%;
                    display: block;
                    text-align: center;
                }
            }

            /** RTL **/
            .rtl {
                direction: rtl;
                font-family: Tahoma, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'Helvetica\', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
            }

            .rtl table {
                text-align: right;
            }

            .rtl table tr td:nth-child(4) {
                text-align: left;
            }
            </style>
        </head>
